title: Urgent Care
shortDtails: Our doctors treat several medical conditions, including 90% of the top issues seen by Urgent Care and the E.R.

title: Medical Advice
shortDtails: Not sure what to do? Get a medical consult from our highly qualified doctors by sending us your question.

title: Get Medicine Reminder
shortDtails: Who remembers to take medicine on time! Thatâ€™s why the web app has a medicine reminder feature which auto-sync with e-prescriptions and will remind you to take the medicine at the right time..

title: Addiction
shortDtails: If you have fallen into a pattern of misusing alcohol, drugs, cigarettes, medications or food, our providers can help you recovery.

title: Depression and Mood
shortDtails: There are several treatment approaches for depression and mood issues that can help you start feeling better.

title: Therapy
shortDtails: Our therapists can provide a safe and confidential space for you while receiving the treatment you need to help with your life.
